meanings.definition: The study of changes in tissues caused by disease.
meanings.sent1: Histopathology helps doctors understand how diseases affect tissues.
meanings.sent2: The histopathology report revealed the presence of cancer cells in the tissue sample.
meanings.sent3: The histopathology lab was so busy that the tissues started a protest for more breaks!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like histopathology slides, revealing the hidden secrets of her health.
meanings.sent5: The vivid images in the histopathology textbook made learning about tissue changes fascinating.

meanings.definition: The examination of tissues for abnormalities.
meanings.sent1: Doctors use histopathology to check tissues for any unusual signs.
meanings.sent2: The histopathology results showed no abnormalities in the tissue structure.
meanings.sent3: The histopathology samples were so strange that they seemed to be from another planet!
meanings.sent4: His mind worked like a histopathology microscope, zooming in on every detail.
meanings.sent5: The histopathology lab was like a detective agency, searching for hidden clues in tissues.

meanings.definition: The analysis of tissue samples for diagnostic purposes.
meanings.sent1: Histopathology is crucial for doctors to make accurate diagnoses based on tissue samples.
meanings.sent2: The hospital invested in advanced equipment for histopathology analysis.
meanings.sent3: The histopathology report was so detailed that it could have been a tissue novel!
meanings.sent4: Her expertise in histopathology was like having a superpower in identifying diseases.
meanings.sent5: The histopathology process was like solving a puzzle, putting together clues from tissue samples.
